# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a line-break strategy with the specified raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw unsigned integer value for the line-break strategy.
title: init(rawValue:)
